subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson and tight end Antonio Gates missed a second straight practice as San Diego continued to prepare for its home wild-card playoff game against the Indianapolis Colts on Saturday night.
snippet: Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson and tight end Antonio Gates missed a second straight practice as San Diego continued to prepare for its home wild-card playoff game against the Indianapolis Colts on Saturday night.
